results.title: Neuroprotective Effects of Long-Term Metformin Preconditioning on Rats with Ischemic Brain Injuries.
results.text_hl: However, after pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@, the pathological @<m>DISEASE_Nephrosis_Lipoid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009402 @@@changes@@@ in the brain were attenuated.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Wang A, Guo H, Zhang Z, Wang S, Pei T, Liu Z, Yang D, Liu Y, Ruan C. Neuroprotective Effects of Long-Term Metformin Preconditioning on Rats with Ischemic Brain Injuries. Eur Neurol. 2021;84(3):212-218. PMID: 33845479

results.title: Metformin attenuates Alzheimer's disease-like neuropathology in obese, leptin-resistant mice.
results.text_hl: The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on these @<m>DISEASE_Nephrosis_Lipoid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009402 @@@changes@@@ also were studied.

citations.NLM: Li J, Deng J, Sheng W, Zuo Z. Metformin attenuates Alzheimer's disease-like neuropathology in obese, leptin-resistant mice. Pharmacol Biochem Behav. 2012 Jun;101(4):564-74. PMID: 22425595
